response.overview: Streaming on www.montageplay.com a film about women to women relationships. All that is bitter is sweet. A beautiful baby in this film things work out for friends and a supportive parenting lifestyle to make her makes one blush. The plot twist is shocking and won't give it away. But worth watching!
response.tagline: Two mothers don't see eye to eye on raising on beautiful baby
response.title: As Bitter As Sweet
